name: Hypnotism, Greater
text: This functions as hypnotism, except it affects 2 Hit Die of creatures per caster level you have. You can make up to five requests (instead of a single request) to each creature affected by the spell, and the requests can be as long and as complicated as you desire (though they still must be reasonable).
text_zh: 此法术如同催眠术运作，除了可以影响每施法者等级2HD的生物。你可以对每个被法术影响的生物提出最多5个要求（取代1个要求），并且这些要求可以如你所愿一样足够长和复杂（但是他们仍然需要合理）。
